results.content: The course seemed great at first but later turned out to be the worst I have ever taken. The instructor was busy talking and not teaching anything. A waste of money & time. I wish I could request a refund.

response.content:
Hi, Oluwafemi. Thanks for your review. I totally respect that you don't like the course. If you have a problem with Udemy during the refunding process, let me know so I can look into it. Or if you're past the money-back guarantee period, I'll figure out something different to make it up for you, because I don't want you to have a bad feeling about this.

Also, it would help me if you could be more specific about what you didn't like about the course and where I failed as a teacher. You never contacted me with any question so it's really hard for me to pinpoint what I should focus on in order to improve the course.

EDIT:
-------
I can see that you're past your money-back guarantee period, however, I don't want you to have a bad feeling by paying for something you don't like. So I suggest I'll send you an Amazon gift card or give you money back via PayPal. Let me know if that works for you. The last thing I want is an unhappy student and I totally respect that you didn't like my course.

Thanks for the response!


Have a great day.
Jan

results.content: this is -maybe- the best FSD course set you can find. there is no room for redundant informations. instructor didn't talk small details through that you can easily find Internet, instead he attached related links. i think upside of any course should be the practice part and instructor provided it thoroughly.

results.content: I was a total beginner to the web development technologies but now I got knowledge on all the topics covered in this course. The Instructor is Knowledgeable and going step by step with examples of each. The course is easy to understand. I highly recommend this course to others. Looking forward for other courses by this instructor. Jan covered so many topics like HTML, CSS, Java Script, Bootstrap, Git & Github etc.

results.content:
This presenter is AMAZING & this student gives this review based upon sincere admiration of his humanity.
He may not be 100% perfect as a teacher, but despite having gone through the worst loss anyone may face in this life - he has become determined to not only move forward, but to actually GIVE generously to others.
Bravo Jan Zavrel !!
You are a fine human being and deserve recognition as such.

He remains to the point & has removed unnecessary content. The dedication of instructor is remarkable. He takes pain for the one who is really willing to Become web Developer and i m so hopeful to that after completing this course i will be well conversant with technologies and perform well in this field.
